subject: Re: Asked to remove chip files
author: Misty
full_text:
Hmmm ok but I dont agree with Sum, and since he ducked out on us the 
info he left behind became public info. These files included. Once you 
guys post something public, it becomes...well public.

So be mad at me, or whatever...but I am reposting the info I have.

Misty



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Sorry All... I was asked by Sum Duk to remove those files for 
personal 
> reasons.  He said I could tell you this.
